title: Project to Strengthen Science Information Search and Utilization Competencies Online

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Scientific Terminology and General Internet Search Skills
context.additional_context: Practice-centered program designed to help elementary teachers effectively evaluate and utilize credible online resources for science lesson preparation

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the credibility of science-related online information sources based on three criteria: author expertise, source transparency, and recency.
Learners can search for necessary information for designing science lessons in five or more reliable databases (e.g., academic papers, government agency reports).
Learners can revise their information utilization project outcomes through peer assessment and submit final lesson design plans incorporating scientific evidence.

resources: Access to Open-Access Databases in Scientific Domains

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
